snippet.title: [ BIKE RACING ADV ] HAPPY CHALLENGER YAMADA - PV
snippet.description:
Bike Racing Adventure Game

The game, originally released in Japanese in 2010, was created out of a desire to preserve the dwindling number of story-driven racing games.

[ Download Game ] 
HAPPY CHALLENGER YAMADA
